height.label: Height of the stream for the detect role.

width.label: Width of the stream for the detect role.

fps.label: Number of frames per second to process through detection.

min_initialized.label: Minimum number of consecutive hits for an object to be initialized by the tracker.

max_disappeared.label: Maximum number of frames the object can disappear before detection ends.

interval.label: Frame interval for checking stationary objects.

threshold.label: Number of frames without a position change for an object to be considered stationary

classifier.label: Enable visual classifier for determing if objects with jittery bounding boxes are stationary.

annotation_offset.label: Milliseconds to offset detect annotations by.
